Created by SQL on 02/27/2018
 
North American Breeding Bird Survey Species List (02/27/2018) in Phylogenetic order.
 
Seq = Sequence number indicating phylogenetic order based on 58th Supplement to AOU Check-list of North American Birds.
AOU = Unique species identification number used for BBS data management purposes.
 
Seq    AOU   English_Common_Name                                French_Common_Name                                 Spanish_Common_Name                                ORDER                                              Family                                             Genus                                              Species                                           
------ ----- -------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------------
     6 01770 Black-bellied Whistling-Duck                       Dendrocygne à ventre noir                          Dendrocygna autumnalis                             Anseriformes                                       Anatidae                                           Dendrocygna                                        autumnalis
